name: Maze Runner Labyrinth 3D: Free Maze Game
name_original: Maze Runner Labyrinth 3D: Free Maze Game
description:
Enter the world of Maze Runner Labyrinth 3D : Free Maze Game
Run for the life with different maze way and find the exit door to save the
life and create victory.

Find the puzzle way the exit door of the maze. Interesting and challenging levels with adventurous look and beautiful graphics.

You can see the map of the maze from above and try to solve the maze.
So, do you think you are smart enough?

Intuitive touch and joystick control to RUN control
PLAY as a beautifully designed character!

many interesting and challenging levels to play in the current version and new levels are coming soon.

RACE the clock and try to find all the keys and reach to the exit point as soon as possible to get more stars!

GamePlay:
+ Run and search the exit door to complete the maze level

+ touch the finger and rotate way left right

+ Fast run for a life and find exit door

Game Features:

+ Amazingly detailed 3D environments

+ Easy controls just look and move through the maze path
